messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: there are [0-9]+ clusters'

Imagine a group with 15 scholars. Amir is connected to Reza, Moin, Pari, and Puja. Wim is connected to Wei, Kim, Puja, and Pam. Raj is connected to Nisha, Ian, Sara, and Kim. Jing is connected to  Reza, Moin, Pari, and Max. Wei is connected to Kim, Puja, and Pam. Nisha is connected to Ian, Sara, and Max. Reza is connected to Moin, and Pari. Kim is connected to Pam. Ian is connected to Sara, and Max. Moin is connected to Pari. Puja is connected to Pam. Sara is connected to Max. How many densely-connected clusters do we have in this group? A densely-connected cluster is a group of scholars that are connected to themselves with a minimum of 2 scholars.

*Amir is connected to Reza Moin, Pari, * Wim, is connection to Wei Kim and
Puga and puja share a similar connection like reza moin and the rest of the scholars are also in groups that share an equal connection in the rest of that cluster like Rez and Amis cluster which would enable this cluste6 to densely connect without missing anyone *
Step 2 let met check to ensure that that all clusters must also have connection among each which would make those connection to densely

Ian connects satra, and mass  Sara so we have all 1 and 2 there cluster can densely connect to satra Ma's cluster each
The second cluster have densely connection is we have Reia. Moain para * Kim puja * all here cluster dense *
Cluswere has  denselly cknnedcted clusters that is, KIm is coorectly conncted Pam Nushai am ax clusters are all properly denscally connecting  one other. Wee don't 1ve any denscularly contineud clusters in thjs grus because Reya and momin each oversaw densely Conneted  Moain and kim so no. of Densonlay connectin clusters or grcrup with atlwst 2 scolars connfeting thesame gwup of schgkels is three *
Answer: There re 3 densely connected clusters in that group * with an average * dense Conneqtion can count o connect 2 cluster as well
